column4: I've got an Asus M2N32-Deluxe motherboard, it has built in wireless & wired connections. How can i completely disable the wireless (it seems to be giving me errors)
- try using the bios to disable the wireless network card
don't be afraid of the bios.  Look around in it for hardware/device stuff and if you can't find it just exit without saving and it's all the same as before you snooped around
bah ive messed around in the bios alot. I just never saw wireless there.
